title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Mammals
body: Mammals       Mammals of Appomattox Court House NHP            Common name   Scientific name   Notes     Order Artiodactyla: Deer     White-tailed deer   Odocoileus virginianus         Order Carnivora: Predatory mammals     Black bear   Ursus americanus         Bobcat   Lynx rufus         Coyote   Canis latrans         Common gray fox   Urocyon cinereoargenteus         Red fox   Vulpes vulpes         Common raccoon   Procyon lotor         Striped skunk   Mephitis mephitis         American mink   Mustela vison         Long-tailed weasel   Mustela frenata         Least weasel   Mustela nivalis         Order Chiroptera: Bats     Little brown myotis   Myotis lucifugus         Northern myotis   Myotis septentrionalis         Silver-haired bat   Lasionycteris noctivagans         Eastern pipistrelle   Pipistrellus subflavus         Big brown bat   Eptesicus fuscus         Eastern red bat   Lasiurus borealis         Hoary bat   Lasiurus cinereus         Order Didelphimorphia: Marsupials     Virginia opossum   Didelphis virginiana         Order Insectivora: Shrews & Moles     Pygmy shrew   Sorex hoyi         Southeastern shrew   Sorex longirostris         Northern short-tailed shrew   Blarina brevicauda         Least shrew   Cryptotis parva         Eastern mole   Scalopus aquaticus         Star-nosed mole   Condylura cristata         Order Lagomorpha: Rabbits     Eastern cottontail   Sylvilagus floridanus         Order Rodentia: Rodents     American beaver   Castor canadensis         Woodchuck (groundhog)   Marmota monax         Common Muskrat   Ondatra zibethicus         Eastern gray squirrel   Sciurus carolinensis         Eastern fox squirrel   Sciurus niger         Southern flying squirrel   Glaucomys volans         Red squirrel   Tamiasciurus hudsonicus         Eastern chipmunk   Tamias striatus         Hispid cotton rat   Sigmodon hisidus         Alleghany woodrat   Neotoma magister         Eastern harvest mouse   Reithrodontomys humulis         White-footed mouse   Peromyscus leucopus         Golden mouse   Ochrotomys nuttalli         Meadow jumping mouse   Zapus hudsonius         Meadow vole   Microtus pennsylvanicus         Woodland vole   Microtus pinetorum         Southern red-backed vole   Clethrionomys gapperi
